mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_no, c.mem_id, c.pro_detail_code, c.cart_price, c.cart_amount, c.cart_date, p.pro_name FROM cart c JOIN product p ON c.pro_detail_code = p.pro_detail_code WHERE c.mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart (mem_id, pro_detail_code, cart_price, cart_amount, cart_date) VALUES (#{mem_id}, #{pro_detail_code}, #{cart_price}, #{cart_amount}, #{cart_date})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cart WHERE cart_no = #{cart_no} AND mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(cart_price * cart_amount) FROM cart WHERE mem_id = #{mem_id}
